name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Vengeance
name_original: Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Vengeance
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Vengeance is an action-shooter game developed by Treyarch. It came out on 02-07-2013. Activision Blizzard published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Call of Duty: Black Ops 2 - Vengeance is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
